name: Autocropping
title: Autocropping
description: Automatically remove noise and other useless sections from images.
author: Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@axle.info)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inputDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: File pattern to use for grouping images.

inputs.name: groupBy
inputs.description: Which file-pattern variables to use for grouping images.

inputs.name: axes
inputs.description: Whether to crop rows, columns or both.

inputs.name: smoothing
inputs.description: Whether to use gaussian smoothing on images to add more tolerance to noise.
